sentence: The latter, Dave McCormick, joins me now.
title: 'The Ingraham Angle' on Biden admin on the ropes

sentence: SOMERSET COUNTY, Pa (WTAJ)– U.S Republican Senate Candidate Dave McCormick made a pit stop at Guy Chemical Company in Somerset Friday to hear more from Pennsylvanian voters.
author: Courtney Murphy
title: Dave McCormick makes stop in Somerset to hear voters

sentence: +16 View gallery +16 View gallery Dr. Mehmet Oz (left) launched a new attack ad against Pennsylvania Senate rival Dave McCormick (right) that calls him out for being a 'finance bro,' a carpetbagger and too cozy with China +16 View gallery The ad debuted Wednesday and featured two vest-wearing, hard seltzer-drinking 'bros' named Tad and Chad, who called McCormick - a former hedge fund manager - their 'hero' +16 View gallery 'He's the wolf of Westport, Connecticut,' Chad says of McCormick, who was born in Pennsylvania, but has lived in the ritzy New York City exurb since 2009 +16 View gallery TWINNING: Chad and Tad have a picture of Republican Pennsylvania Senate hopeful Dave McCormick next to them - and they're all wearing the same outfit +16 View gallery The ad uses imagery connecting Dave McCormick (left) with Chinese President Xi Jinping (right) +16 View gallery The 'bros' pound hard seltzer in the ad and ask if Dave McCormick is forced to drink Yuengling, a Pennsylvania-made beer +16 View gallery The ad wraps up with more images of Chinese President Xi Jinping (left) and Pennsylvania Senate hopeful Dave McCormick (right) Chad laughs that McCormick is 'pitching the locals he's one of them,' while Tad chimes in that, 'Pennsylvanians are fools.'
author: Nikki Schwab
title: Dr Oz. releases bizarre attack ad on opponent David McCormick mocking hard seltzer, vests and 'finance bros' - claiming he puts China over voters in Pennsylvania

author: Jon Delano
title: David McCormick reacts to Trump's endorsement of Mehmet Oz and denies shipping jobs to China

sentence: The nation is watching us work to reclaim the greatness of our country, and sending someone, someone like Dave McCormick, to Washington, D.C. is something you can be proud of.
author: WKOK Staff
title: McCormick Rally with Sec. Pompeo: America Headed ‘Wrong Direction’
